rules_text:
When this land enters, sacrifice it. Search your library for a basic Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{1}{G}{G}{U}{U}, Discard Regrowing Outlands: Create two tapped tokens that are copies of target land.
notes:
!tapped

if uncommon: Regrowing Outlands / Flooded Outlands

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
